zh-cn: 基尔·罗德尼·斯塔默爵士
en: The Rt Hon. Sir Keir Starmer

description.zh-cn: 英国工党籍政治人物和御用大律师，现任英国首相及工党党魁。曾任刑事检控专员及反对党领袖。
description.en: A British Labour Party politician and King's Counsel, currently serving as Prime Minister of the United Kingdom and Leader of the Labour Party. He previously served as Director of Public Prosecutions and Leader of the Opposition.

description.zh-cn: 英国保守党政治人物，曾任英国首相。在2024年英国大选中败给基尔·斯塔默领导的工党。
description.en: A British Conservative Party politician who served as Prime Minister of the United Kingdom. He was defeated by Keir Starmer's Labour Party in the 2024 general election.

description.zh-cn: 现任英国君主。
description.en: The current monarch of the United Kingdom.

description.zh-cn: 英国政治人物，曾任工党党魁，是基尔·斯塔默的前任。
description.en: A British politician who served as Leader of the Labour Party, and was Keir Starmer's predecessor.

description.zh-cn: 英国保守党政治人物，曾任英国首相。其任内发生的“派对门”丑闻受到时任反对党领袖基尔·斯塔默的猛烈批评。
description.en: A British Conservative Party politician who served as Prime Minister of the United Kingdom. The 'Partygate' scandal during his tenure was heavily criticized by then-Leader of the Opposition Keir Starmer.

description.zh-cn: 英国保守党政治人物，曾短暂担任英国首相。其政府的迷你预算案受到时任反对党领袖基尔·斯塔默的批评。
description.en: A British Conservative Party politician who briefly served as Prime Minister of the United Kingdom. Her government's mini-budget was criticized by then-Leader of the Opposition Keir Starmer.

description.zh-cn: 基尔·斯塔默的妻子，曾为律师，后在英国国家医疗服务体系（NHS）工作。
description.en: Wife of Keir Starmer, a former solicitor who later worked in the National Health Service (NHS).

description.zh-cn: 英国工党的第一任党魁。
description.en: The first leader of the British Labour Party.

description.zh-cn: 基尔·斯塔默的父亲，是一名工具制造商。
description.en: Father of Keir Starmer, worked as a toolmaker.

description.zh-cn: 基尔·斯塔默的母亲，是一名护士。
description.en: Mother of Keir Starmer, worked as a nurse.

description.zh-cn: 印度裔英国富商，工党的主要赞助者之一。在“赠品门”丑闻中被揭露向斯塔默等人提供大量赠品。
description.en: An Indo-Guyanese-British multimillionaire businessman and a major donor to the Labour Party, revealed to have provided significant gifts to Starmer and others in the 'freebies' controversy.

description.zh-cn: 英国的主要政党之一，属于中间偏左翼。
description.en: One of the major political parties in the United Kingdom, considered centre-left.

description.zh-cn: 英国的主要政党之一，属于中间偏右翼。
description.en: One of the major political parties in the United Kingdom, considered centre-right.

zh-cn: 牛津大学圣艾德蒙学堂

nodes.id: Director of Public Prosecutions (England and Wales)

zh-cn: 英格兰及威尔斯刑事检控专员
en: Director of Public Prosecutions (England and Wales)

description.zh-cn: 英格兰及威尔斯皇家检控署的负责人职位。
description.en: The head of the Crown Prosecution Service for England and Wales.

description.zh-cn: 2024年7月4日举行的英国大选，工党获得压倒性胜利，结束了保守党14年的执政。
description.en: The general election held on 4 July 2024, in which the Labour Party won a landslide victory, ending 14 years of Conservative rule.

description.zh-cn: 在2024年绍斯波特持刀袭击事件后，英国各地发生的一系列主要由极右翼团体发起的骚乱。
description.en: A series of riots across the United Kingdom, primarily initiated by far-right groups, following the 2024 Southport stabbing.

description.zh-cn: 2024年7月29日在英格兰绍斯波特发生的一起持刀袭击事件，导致多名儿童死伤，并引发了全国性的骚乱。
description.en: A mass stabbing incident in Southport, England on 29 July 2024, which resulted in the death and injury of several children and triggered nationwide riots.

description.zh-cn: 一桩政治丑闻，揭露了基尔·斯塔默和其他工党成员接受赞助者的大量未适当申报的赠品和招待。
description.en: A political scandal revealing that Keir Starmer and other Labour Party members had accepted numerous undeclared gifts and hospitality from donors.

description.zh-cn: 一项由英国保守党政府提出的移民政策，旨在将寻求庇护者送往卢旺达处理其申请。
description.en: An immigration policy proposed by the UK Conservative government to send asylum seekers to Rwanda to have their claims processed.

description.zh-cn: 基尔·斯塔默接替里希·苏纳克成为英国首相。此前，斯塔默作为反对党领袖与时任首相的苏纳克在议会进行政治辩论。
description.en: Keir Starmer succeeded Rishi Sunak as Prime Minister. Previously, Starmer, as Leader of the Opposition, politically debated then-Prime Minister Sunak in Parliament.

description.zh-cn: 查尔斯三世在2024年大选后正式任命基尔·斯塔默为英国首相。
description.en: Charles III formally appointed Keir Starmer as Prime Minister of the United Kingdom following the 2024 general election.

position.zh-cn: 影子脱离欧洲联盟事务大臣
position.en: Shadow Secretary of State for Exiting the European Union

description.zh-cn: 在杰瑞米·柯宾领导的影子内阁中担任影子脱欧事务大臣。
description.en: Served as the Shadow Secretary of State for Exiting the European Union in Jeremy Corbyn's shadow cabinet.

description.zh-cn: 基尔·斯塔默在2020年党魁选举中获胜，接替杰瑞米·柯宾成为工党党魁。
description.en: Keir Starmer won the 2020 leadership election, succeeding Jeremy Corbyn as Leader of the Labour Party.

description.zh-cn: 作为反对党领袖，斯塔默对约翰逊政府提出批评，并在2022年7月的政府危机期间提出不信任投票。
description.en: As Leader of the Opposition, Starmer criticized the Johnson government and tabled a no-confidence motion during the July 2022 government crisis.

description.zh-cn: 作为反对党领袖，斯塔默对特拉斯政府的迷你预算案等政策提出批评。
description.en: As Leader of the Opposition, Starmer criticized the Truss government's policies, including the mini-budget.

description.zh-cn: 自2020年4月4日起担任工党党魁，并领导该党在2024年大选中取得压倒性胜利。
description.en: Has served as the Leader of the Labour Party since 4 April 2020, and led the party to a landslide victory in the 2024 general election.

description.zh-cn: 在2024年大选中领导工党取得压倒性胜利后，基尔·斯塔默被任命为英国首相。
description.en: After leading the Labour Party to a landslide victory in the 2024 general election, Keir Starmer was appointed Prime Minister.

description.zh-cn: 2024年英国大选结束了保守党连续14年的执政。
description.en: The 2024 UK general election ended 14 consecutive years of rule by the Conservative Party.

relationships.target: Director of Public Prosecutions (England and Wales)

description.zh-cn: 就任首相后，基尔·斯塔默宣布撤销卢旺达庇护计划。
description.en: Upon becoming Prime Minister, Keir Starmer announced the cancellation of the Rwanda asylum plan.

description.zh-cn: 作为首相，斯塔默谴责骚乱为“极右翼暴行”，并下令组建特别职务警队以应对。
description.en: As Prime Minister, Starmer condemned the riots as 'far-right thuggery' and ordered the formation of a specialist police force to counter them.

description.zh-cn: 绍斯波特持刀袭击事件引发了英国全国各地的极右翼骚乱。
description.en: The Southport stabbing triggered far-right riots across the United Kingdom.

description.zh-cn: “赠品门”丑闻使基尔·斯塔默受到舆论批评，并被指控违反议会规则。
description.en: The 'freebies' controversy subjected Keir Starmer to public criticism and accusations of breaching parliamentary rules.

description.zh-cn: 作为工党的主要赞助者，瓦希德·阿里向基尔·斯塔默提供了包括服饰、住宿、门票在内的大量赠品和招待，引发了“赠品门”争议。
description.en: As a major Labour donor, Waheed Alli provided Keir Starmer with numerous gifts and hospitality, including clothing, accommodation, and tickets, which led to the 'freebies' controversy.

description.zh-cn: 基尔·斯塔默的双亲是工党支持者，并以工党第一任党魁凯尔·哈第的名字为他命名。
description.en: Keir Starmer's parents were Labour supporters and named him after Keir Hardie, the first leader of the party.
